short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Matchmaking tools for TF2Center and logs.tf.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool allows you to auto-join lobbies on the lobby selection screen to a class slot of your choosing. It will maintain the ready state for your slot so you do not need to manage the timer manually. Matches on logs.tf will display ratings for each player as well as designate an MVP.
